title: She Builds CORSAIR's NEW Gaming PC Kit
description: *Sponsor* Check out the new CORSAIR BUILD KITS here:   Anna, builds the new CORSAIR build kit with no help from me, and it went pretty well.  Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on by 'Joining' the channel on YouTube here:  Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
